author: UltPanda
description: A cog for managing One Piece themed events in your server. Schedule watch parties, manga discussions, quiz nights, and more with automated reminders.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the OnePieceEvents cog! Use `[p]help events` to see the available commands. Set up watch parties, manga discussions, theory crafting sessions, and much more with ease!
short: One Piece themed events management for your server
